name: Risk weighted exposure amount after supporting factors.Regulatory add-on
description: Risk-weighted exposure amount (after the application of both the SME supporting factor and the infrastructure supporting factor) resulting from a bank-specific regulatory add-on (i.e. the monetary equivalent of the add-on for model weaknesses and imperfections; does not include regulatory add-ons resulting from macro-prudential measures in accordance with Article 458 CRR)
